plot outline: Bhollu Sardar tells the story of a child Bhallu who wants to become a good-at-heart bandit who, like a modern-day Robin Hood, would steal money from the rich and donate it to the poor. He embarks on a quest to find wicked people (Naradhams) and bring them to justice.But it is the tale of his depressed aunt and his worldly detached uncle that captures his attention. The rest of the film deals with how Bhallu brings happiness into the lives of his uncle and aunt.
